description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Project windstorm is an arcade-like style paratrooper game which takes place in the sky amongst clouds, planes, and other hazards which must be approached differently. In the game you take control of a paratrooper and are tasked with completing mission specific objectives. This game features falling out of planes, guns, missiles, explosions, humour, witty dialogue but thankfully no car chases.
